ResearchProjectDef.label: albino spider studies Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the spider imbuing table, as well as the creation of imbued spider pods using albino spider pods.\n\nAdditionally, the chances of obtaining an albino spider pod after killing an albino spider is increased by 10%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: albino spider studies Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of spider mines, using imbued spider pods.\n\nAdditionally, the chances of obtaining an albino spider pod after killing an albino spider is increased by 10%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: albino spider studies Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of mind control and chemfuel spider pods. Also allows for the construction of albino spider egg sacs, and unlocks a surgery to implant albino spider pods.\n\nAdditionally, the chances of obtaining an albino spider pod after killing an albino spider is increased by 10%.
